CustomField.description: Urgent - Tech issues that are of extreme urgency and affect more than 5 people High - Tech issues that are of high urgency and affect you Medium - Tech issues that are of medium importance that do not get in the way of essential work Low - Tech issues that can wait 2-3 days
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Urgent - Tech issues that are of extreme urgency and affect more than 5 people
High - Tech issues that are of high urgency and affect you
Medium - Tech issues that do not get in the way of essential work
Low - Tech issues that can wait 2-3 days
CustomField.label: Priority
